description:
Be Nice and Grow famous is a course about doing things differently its aimed directly at those who would like to transform their lives:

  • It's for you if you are currently in a 9-5 with no reasonable light, prospects or well-deserved recognition at the end of the tunnel.
  • It's for you if you are in a dead end job with no hope or passion.
  • It's for you if you don't have money or a budget to start a transformational project.
  • It's for you if you need a step by step “how to” and a guide to transform your working life
  • It's for you if you need the instruction manual to transform.
  • It's for you if you want to get into action, but are just not sure where to start or how to get there.
  • It's for you if you know that there has got to be something better or a mission purely for you to accomplish

This course is for you and it's a little bit different…

…It's different because its not a theoretical thesis of what could be. But it's a step by step list of actions, techniques and tools you can use to carry out a successful project and raise your profile, abilities, credibility at the same time.

The course is delivered with simple video slides with each lecture bring backed up with lecture notes pdfs.

As an added bonus there is a downloadable document including all the matrixes, templates and action lists referred to in the course
title: Be  Nice and Grow Famous
